reasons.title: Realtors Earn $400 per Referral
reasons.description: We pay you $400 for every referred client!

reasons.title: Keep Working With Your Client
reasons.description: Your customers STAY your customers, so when they want to sell down the road we send them right back to you!

reasons.title: Minimize Your Headaches
reasons.description: Managing a rental property isn't an easy walk in the park, there is a lot of liability and it takes a lot of time. Let us handle the nonsense so you're free to do what you do best - sell property!

reasons.title: We Make You Look Awesome!
reasons.description: We care for our clients and show it by delivering amazing Property Management Services!

reasons.title: Maximize Your Client's ROI
reasons.description: We combine cutting edge technology and top-notch customer service with customized property management services to minimize vacancies and maximize rental incomes, protecting their investment until it's time for you to sell it.

nextStep.title: What's The Next Step?
nextStep.description: Tell us about your customer, and once they hire us we deliver your referral fee!
